description.p: This tradition focuses on channeling kinetic energy offensively, granting the Monk's versatile abilities to unleash devastating attacks in combat.

At 3rd level, spend 1 Kinetic Charge to evade foes. Each creature within 30 ft must make a Perception check (DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Dex modifier). On failure, you become shrouded in kinetic energy, allowing movement as if invisible for up to 1 minute or until you attack.

At 6th level, spend 1 Kinetic Charge to create an indistinguishable kinetic copy for 1 minute. The next attack that hits you has a 50% chance to target the copy instead, negating the damage and destroying the copy.
At 13th level, your movement produces no sound, leaves no trace, and you automatically succeed on Stealth checks.
At 13th level, you may have unlimited Kinetic Residues. Each unarmed strike adds +1 damage per active residue.
